common_0095_mama_02:
I hear that Nemona here will be taking you
to school?[npcn:2B]
common_0095_rival_01: That’s right, ma’am. Leave it to me![npcn:4]
common_0095_mama_03: So you’ve already managed to make a friend![npcn:2B]
common_0095_mama_04:
And I read about all the wonderful teachers
you’ll have looking after you at the school.\c
Plus so many handy facilities you can use as much
as you like![npcn:2B]
common_0095_mama_05:
Add in your new friend, Nemona, and it sounds
like your school life is shaping up to be fantastic![npcn:2B]
common_0095_mama_09:
Now, you’ll be staying in the school dorms, so I
want you to promise me you’ll eat proper meals.[npcn:2B]
common_0095_mama_06:
Here’s a bit of spending money to start off with.
I also packed a lunch for your first day![npcn:2B]
common_0095_mama_10: Oh! And maybe you’d better take these, too.[npcn:2B]
common_0095_mama_11:
Use them on that precious little partner of yours,
should it get hurt in battle.[npcn:2B]
common_0095_mama_12:
I know every day in your new life is going to be
full of exciting experiences, far from home.[npcn:2B]
common_0095_mama_13:
Just try to savor them all—the good times and
the hard times, too![npcn:2B]
common_0095_mama_07:
But if you ever want to come back home, you
know your bed is always ready for you.[npcn:2B]
common_0095_mama_08:
Oh, all right then! You two had better be off,
I suppose. Take care on the way to school![npcn:2B]
common_0095_rival_03:
Oh! But I was going to teach you how to catch
wild Pokémon! C’mon, vamos![npcn:4]
